author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Global cases pass 2 million as IMF warns of zero growth in Asia
description: US now worst-affected country with 639,055 cases and 30,925 fatalities from disease
content:
Global cases of coronavirus passed the two million mark on Thursday, with 2,064,115 confirmed coronavirus cases worldwide, according to the Johns Hopkins University tracker. 
The number of people who have died so far in the crisis stands at 137,020. The US i… [+2909 chars]
